review: Love my fire stick. Only wish it had previews like my Apple TV does.

review: Aesy to set up now I can start to watch eome Movies I miss working late

review: It is much more than our expectations.We have got a great deal of enjoyment out of it. We would recomend it .  John and Bonnie Carter
author: John Carter

review: The Fire TV Stick is  a nice small piece of equipment that allows access to other forms of entertainment from you TV. I'm happy with the performance of the stick and it allows us more choices in our TV watching.
author: K. Williams "K. Williams"

review: Completely in love with this product. The set up was easier than easy and so much great content.
author: Jacqueline Gum

review: The device was great, allows me to give the kids access to my plex media from any TV.  Only issue i have is the fact that Amazon charges for the Plex app when I have a plex pass account and amazon doesn't offer the plex pass app in there app store.
author: Legend
